messages: I ain't know em but I see how everybody affected by his death...mourning ain't gone bring em back but stoppin the violence will keep peace.
I ain't know em but I see how everybody affected by his death...mourning ain't gone bring em back but stoppin the violence will keep peace.
Listening to music, playin 2k chillin HMU.....
